name: object_detection
template: urisourcebin buffer_size=4096 name="source" ! flvdemux name=demux demux.video ! h264parse ! video/x-h264 ! tee name=t ! queue2 ! avdec_h264 ! videoconvert name="videoconvert" ! video/x-raw,format=BGRx ! queue leaky=upstream ! gvadetect ie-config=CPU_BIND_THREAD=NO model="{models[object_detection_2020R2][1][network]}" model-proc="{models[object_detection_2020R2][1][proc]}" name="detection" ! gvametaconvert name="metaconvert" ! queue ! gvametapublish name="destination" ! appsink name=appsink t. ! queue2 max-size-time=60500000000 ! splitmuxsink muxer=qtmux muxer-pad-map=x-pad-map, video=video_1 max-size-time=60500000000 name="splitmuxsink"
